questions.question: Why is it important to plan a story or theme before designing a game?
questions.answer: Planning a story or theme helps you decide what your game will be about. It gives you a clear idea of what the characters should do, what the world should look like, and what challenges the player will face. With a good plan, your game feels more fun, creative, and makes more sense to people who play it.
